resources.string: The authentication type provided is not valid. Please ensure that you are using the correct authentication type.
An unexpected error occurred while accessing the storage.
There was a problem connecting to the network. Please check your internet connection and try again.
No supported browser found. Please install a browser and try again.
Null user account. This may have been caused by unexpected behavior.
Null user account. This may have been caused by unexpected behavior.
The verification URL is incorrect. Please check the URL and try again.
Your device has encountered an unexpected error. Please try restarting your device.
Token usage failed. Please check your network connection or Firefly III OAuth Authorized applications and try again.
A user with identifier %1s and server address %2s already exists. Please switch to that user instead.
